method.description: Entity extraction from question -> Graph lookup -> Attention edge expansion -> Source retrieval
method.graph_traversal: ATTENDED edges for entity expansion, EXTRACTED_FROM for source lookup

interpretation.recall_68%: Graph successfully finds 68% of relevant source documents
interpretation.low_precision: Returns many extra sources - expected for context compilation use case
interpretation.use_case: LLM context compiler - retrieve broad context, let LLM filter relevance
